{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''CheckRange'''(double ''distance''[, bool ''two_dimension''])
== Usage == Checks if the Actor is in range of any players or cameras a player is looking through.
=== Parameters === *''distance'' - The range to check against. *''two_dimension'' - False by default. If true, the distance will only be checked along the xy axis.
=== Return value === Returns false if a player is in range of the Actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
